data.prayer: Father, move the 23,548 believers in the state of Thừa Thiên Huế to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Thừa Thiên Huế, Vietnam
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Thừa Thiên Huế, Vietnam.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Thừa Thiên Huế, Vietnam a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Thừa Thiên Huế. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Trieng people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Trieng people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Trieng people is yours.
Spirit, encourage the church of Thừa Thiên Huế, Vietnam that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Jesus, help the church in the state of Thừa Thiên Huế to not rely on buildings or programs, but on your Spirit and the simple faithfulness of every believer.

data.section_summary:
the state of Thừa Thiên Huế, Vietnam has a population of 1,088,700.

We estimate Thừa Thiên Huế has 23,548 people who might know Jesus, 87,327 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 977,825 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 46 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 23,548 believers in Thừa Thiên Huế, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.
